assessmentQuestionVersion.name: FSC_FF_LifeStage
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Which of the following best describes your current financial stage of life?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: I have minimal financial obligations to build wealth for short-term and long-term goals. I’m planning for my future home and I expect to experience (or am already experiencing) a high rate of purchasing household and consumer goods. I own my primary residence and can comfortably manage household and family expenses. I’m currently earning income and can effectively manage my mortgage. I’m planning for retirement, I own my own home, and I have minimal financial obligations. I’m retired and maintain my lifestyle with planned funds and investments.
